about_the_game:
Girls for sex include 10 beautiful female characters in skimpy revealing outfits ready to fucking in your game. You can make them completely naked or partially dressed. Using different settings, you can create perfect girls of your dreams and manage them according to your wishes. You can use them as main characters, give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom those cute girls will fuck today.

All girls have working genitals with a lot of different settings. Also, you can change the size of body, make it thin or thick, make an athletic or beautiful curvy girl, add them pregnancy, also you can change the settings for their vaginas, clitoris and anuses, boob's size, etc.

Discover what else can offer you this cool DLC and have a fun.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you can replace main character on scene.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters are completely naked and have working genitals.
